question:
Essay topics: You work for an in the international company. you have seen an advertisement for a training course which will be useful for your job.
Write a letter to your manager. In your letter
. Describe the training course you want to do.
.explainwhat the company could do to help you.
. say how the course will be useful for your job.
text: I am writing this letter to inform about my interest in joining the training course which is scheduled to happen next month at the community center in our area.
Yesterday while working on some of the assigned tasks, I saw an advert regarding the advanced networking program on one of the news website.

The duration of the course is one month, so, to join, I need off for that duration and if it is not possible to grant leave for the long duration, I can work from home or come to office after the session for the day.

When I checked the details of the coaching, I suddenly realised that our team lacks the advanced security handling of the servers, which is the key aspect of this training and it will be beneficial for our company if any person from the networking division joins this course. As you know, last year, we face the security threat due to some third party attack on our servers and our organisation also suffer from severe loss, so, in my opinion, this can help us strengthen our firewalls and networks.
I am waiting for the positive response.
